short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seach ISBN and book title right from any web page and lookup content from Amazon, Bookshop, Booksamillion, Scribd, Google Books.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lookup ISBN and Book on Amazon.com, Bookshop.org, Booksamillion.com, Scribd.com, Google Books right from any webpage. 

You don't have to copy text then enter into site search bar of Amazon. You can simply select any text and ISBN on any website and do search on Amazon and other book site.

This is super lightweight Chrome extension that will run in background and do the simple job that is made for. No configuration needed, high performance and no tracking code installed.

Disclosure: Some of the links used in the extension are affiliate links, meaning, at no additional cost to you, I will earn a commission if you click through and make a purchase.
